title: HELP
body: i just updated the game for new client and it keeps bug splating after i press launch. what do i do?

replies.body: Try running the in-client repair tool. Occasionally patches break things with little rhyme or reason.

Without much more context, it's a little hard for me to troubleshoot what's making your client crash. Check out our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for some general troubleshooting steps, and hit me back up if you still can't get logged in.

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg

Rid yourself of the pests which harass your gameplay by using the [Bug & Crash Exterminator.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Kha’Zix and Elise won’t know what hit ‘em.
